listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Cast aside by Hollywood, screen legends Joan Crawford and Bette Davis battle each other when they sign up for What Ever Happened To Baby Jane?
With production on Baby Jane underway, Bette and Joan form an alliance, but outside forces conspire against them.
Production reaches its climax; Bette's relationship with her daughter becomes strained; Joan reveals an intimate detail about her past.
Bad word-of-mouth plagues Baby Jane; Bette and Joan brace for failure; Pauline tries to break gender barriers; Oscar nominations are announced.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: And the Winner Is... (The Oscars of 1963)
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Bette is on track to win a record-breaking third ''Best Actress'' Oscar; Joan and Hedda launch a clandestine campaign against Bette.
Hungry for another hit, Warner pressures Aldrich to bring the original team back together for a follow-up horror film; Someone from Joan's past poses a threat.
With production of Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte' underway, the feud intensifies; Bette reveals her vulnerabilities to Bob.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: You Mean All This Time We Could Have Been Friends?
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Joan accepts a leading role on a new film, despite her deteriorating health; Faced with a new rival, Bette reflects on her misplaced feud with Joan.
